name: node-red-contrib-hubitat
description: Node Red module for Hubitat API
author: Francois Blackburn

scripts.bump:prepare: git checkout master && git pull origin master
scripts.bump:patch: npm bump:prepare && npm version --patch && npm bump:complete
scripts.bump:minor: npm bump:prepare && npm version --minor && npm bump:complete
scripts.bump:major: npm bump:prepare && npm version --major && npm bump:complete
scripts.bump:complete: git push origin && git push origin --tags
